channel.title: Ugh, port forwarding help, (Still need help)
channel.description:
Portforward.com is about as usefull as an invisible door right now,
i have a bt homehub. it tells me what to do, i do that, and i can only do it to pcs on my f'in network :'(
please help, i need to get it on no-ip, none of my irl friends want to dl ham bacuase of the virus chance :(
Please help get my server up!

Thanks. i dont use ham anymore, keeps cutting me off, i didnt have the dl thats why…

first of all hamachi is shit in my oppinoon use moparisthebest.com or the client and fgo to no-ip.com and at the top click downloads and and download no-ip duc for windows, make sure you hav an acc on no-ip.com
